title: Tether and Rumble Launch Rumble Wallet, Bringing Self-Custodial Crypto Payments to Millions of Creators and Users
content: Tether, the largest company in the digital assets industry, and Rumble (NASDAQ:RUM), the Freedom-First technology platform, today announced the launch of Rumble Wallet, a self-custodial crypto wallet integrated directly into the Rumble ecosystem. title: Tether Introduces Scudo, Redefining Fractional Gold Ownership Onchain
